Saxmundham Mobile Library Route 9

Contact us:

Manager: Helen Hudson and Peter Fiske

Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk

Telephone: 01473 263838

Route timetable

Stop Village Location Time
9A Oulton Herivan Gardens 1015 – 1040
9B Corton Wheatacre Drive 1050 – 1100
9C Corton Station Road 1115 – 1145
9D Lound Near pond 1200 – 1215
9E Somerleyton Village Hall 1230 – 1250
9F Somerleyton Green 1355 – 1415
9G Blundeston Plough PH 1430 – 1450
9H Wrentham Village Hall 1525 – 1550

Calling every 4 weeks on Tuesdays:

2016: 26 January, 23 February, 22 March, 19 April, 17 May, 14 June, 12 July, 9 August, 6 September, 4 October, 1 November, 29 November, no visit in December
